div.head: 胎產諸病
div.div: all diseases related to fetus and delivery

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: all diseases related to fetus and delivery

sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of women’s diseases related to pregnancy and delivery. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry chong wei 茺蔚：若治腫毒瘡瘍，消水行血，婦人胎產諸病，則宜並用為良 , “When treating swelling from poison, sores and ulcers, to dissolve water and make blood flow, and for all diseases in women related to a fetus and delivery , it is advisable to use them together as a good approach”.
